org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.chromium.debug.ui

Class DialogUtils.Updater

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.chromium.debug.ui.DialogUtils.Updater
  • Enclosing class:
    DialogUtils

    public static class DialogUtils.Updater
extends java.lang.Object
    Helps to conduct update for vertices in a value graph. Technically Updater does not see a real graph, because it doesn't support vertices that are simultaneously source and consumer. Programmer helps manage other edges manually by calling reportChanged(org.eclipse.wst.jsdt.chromium.debug.ui.DialogUtils.ValueSource<?>) method.

    Updater supports conditional updating. At some place in graph there may be switcher that introduces several scopes. The switcher has only one active scope at a time, that is controlled by an expression provided. The scope may contain parts of the graph and only the active scope has its vertices updated, update in other scopes is deferred. Vertices from the scope are only available via vertex called merger from outside of this scope. Scopes may be nested. Updater always has a root scope.

      • addConsumer

        public void addConsumer(DialogUtils.ValueConsumer value,

        Registers a consumer vertex with all its dependencies. The root scope is assumed.

                        DialogUtils.ValueConsumer consumer)
        Registers a consumer within a particular scope.

      • addSource

        public void addSource(DialogUtils.Scope scope,
                      DialogUtils.ValueSource<?> source)
        Registers a source within a particular scope.

      • addDependency

        public void addDependency(DialogUtils.ValueConsumer consumer,
                          DialogUtils.ValueSource<?> source)
        Adds a dependency of consumer on source. Source may be from the same scope or from the outer scope.

      • addDependency

        public void addDependency(DialogUtils.ValueConsumer consumer,
                          java.util.List<? extends DialogUtils.ValueSource<?>> sourceList)
        Adds a dependency of consumer on several sources. See #addDependency(ValueConsumer, ValueSource).

      • reportChanged

        public void reportChanged(DialogUtils.ValueSource<?> source)
        Reports about sources that have been changed and plans future update of consumers. This method may be called at any time.

      • update

        public void update()
        Performs update of all vertices that need it. If some sources are reported changed during the run of this method, their consumers are also updated.

      • updateAll

        public void updateAll()
        Updates all consumer vertices in graph.

      • rootScope

        public DialogUtils.Scope rootScope()
        Returns a root scope that updater always has.

      • updateAsync

        public void updateAsync()
        Request deferred update. This method may be called from any thread.

      • stopAsync

        public void stopAsync()
        Stops asynchronous updates -- an activity which is hard to stop directly.
